title: Until The Summer
description: When Natalie Quimby started working as a third grade teacher she vowed to shed her socialite skin for good. And things were going great. Enter tall, dark and handsome August Huffman. He's everything Natalie wants in a man. There's just one problem, he's the father of one of her students.Will Natalie finally find love, or is she doomed to repeat past mistakes?
author: Elle Jefferson
